opis: Pobjegnite u umirujući raj s ovom prekrasnom kućom na prodaju u Posedarju, smještenom samo 80 metara od plaže. Smještena u mirnom dijelu grada, ova trokatnica pruža idealno mjesto za opuštanje i uživanje u prekrasnom priobalnom okruženju. Kuća je pažljivo osmišljena kako bi pružila udobnost i privatnost na svakom katu. Prizemlje sadrži prostrani stan s dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonicom, kuhinjom s blagovaonicom i dnevnim boravkom. Terasa i garaža upotpunjuju ovo razina. Na prvom katu nalazi se troetažni stan s tri spavaće sobe, kupaonicom, kuhinjom, dnevnim boravkom i blagovaonicom te terasom s spektakularnim pogledom na more. Na drugom katu nalazi se još jedan stan s tri spavaće sobe, svaka s vlastitom kupaonicom, kuhinjom, dnevnim boravkom i prekrasnom terasom s još ljepšim pogledom na more. Svaki kat ima površinu od 120 četvornih metara. Dodatno, kuća uključuje garažu i tri parkirna mjesta ispred kuće, osiguravajući dovoljno prostora za parkiranje vozila. U neposrednoj blizini kuće nalaze se neke od najljepših prirodnih atrakcija Hrvatske. Možete istražiti rijeku Zrmanju, poznatu po svojim impresivnim kanjonima i aktivnostima poput raftinga i kanuinga. Velebit, planina poznata po svojoj netaknutoj prirodi, nudi brojne mogućnosti za planinarenje i istraživanje. Osim toga, grad Zadar, jedan od najšarmantnijih dalmatinskih gradova, udaljen je samo nekoliko kilometara. Možete istražiti povijesni centar grada, uživati ​​u prekrasnim plažama, otkrivati bogato kulturno nasljeđe i uživati ​​u ukusnoj dalmatinskoj kuhinji. Ne propustite priliku postati vlasnikom ove prekrasne kuće u Posedarju, samo nekoliko koraka udaljene od plaže i okružene prirodnim ljepotama poput rijeke Zrmanje, Velebita i blizine Zadra. Za dodatne informacije ili dogovor razgledavanja, slobodno nas kontaktirajte. Andrea Culi +385 98 80 90 94 Radujemo se vašem pozivu! Escape to a tranquil paradise with this stunning house for sale in Posedarje, located just 80 meters from the beach. Situated in a peaceful part of the town, this three-story house offers an ideal place for relaxation and enjoyment in the stunning coastal surroundings. The house is thoughtfully designed to provide comfort and privacy on each floor. The ground floor features a spacious apartment with two bedrooms, a bathroom, a kitchen with a dining area, and a living room. A terrace and a garage complete this level. The first floor offers a three-bedroom apartment with a bathroom, a kitchen, a living room, and a dining area with a terrace boasting spectacular sea views. On the second floor, there is another apartment with three bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, a kitchen, a living room, and a beautiful terrace with even more stunning sea views. Each floor has an area of 120 square meters. Additionally, the house includes a garage and three parking spaces in front, providing ample parking for vehicles. In close proximity to the house, you will find some of Croatia's most beautiful natural attractions. You can explore the Zrmanja River, known for its breathtaking canyons and outdoor activities such as rafting and canoeing. The Velebit Mountain, renowned for its pristine nature, offers numerous opportunities for hiking and exploration. Furthermore, the city of Zadar, one of the most charming Dalmatian cities, is just a few kilometers away. You can explore the historic city center, enjoy beautiful beaches, discover rich cultural heritage, and indulge in delicious Dalmatian cuisine. Don't miss the opportunity to become the owner of this beautiful house in Posedarje, just steps away from the beach and surrounded by natural wonders like the Zrmanja River, Velebit Mountain, and the proximity to Zadar.
